item.description: Imagine a future where Canadians, Mexicans, and Americans all see themselves as Americansâ€”united by clean energy, shared values, and a common economic infrastructure. The American Union proposes a holistic model of democratic royalty, cross-border logistics, and FDIC-insured crypto to lift the hemisphere as one.
